sub_title: Full Professor Data-Driven Interaction (AI & Data Science)
summary:
We work on Data-Driven Interaction, primarily in the domains of health and well-being. Data-Driven Interaction: 
i) is embedded, embodied, and ambient, 
ii) requires real-time processing of heterogeneous unstructured data streams (e.g., video, text, and biosignals), and 
iii) is both highly dynamic and interactive. 
My research focusses on Data-Driven Interaction’s foundations: designing efficient, intelligent, real-time signal processing algorithms and effective, personalized, empathic, and sustainable manifold interaction patterns.

profile_positions.description: My group I works on Data-Driven Interaction (DDI) , primarily in the domains of health and well-being. DDI i) is embedded, embodied, and ambient, ii) requires real-time processing of heterogeneous unstructured data streams (e.g., video, text, and biosignals), and iii) is both highly dynamic and interactive. My research focusses on DDI ’s foundations: designing efficient, intelligent, real-time signal processing algorithms and effective, personalized, empathic, and sustainable manifold interaction patterns.
profile_positions.title: Full Professor Data-Driven Interaction

profile_positions.title: Associate Professor

profile_positions.description: In a private capacity, I am vice-chair of the Ethical Review Committee, Faculties of Science and Geosciences, Utrecht University. As such, I manage and supervise the daily process of the assessment of research proposal on their ethical aspects.
profile_positions.title: Vice-chair of the ethical review board, Faculties of Science & Geosciences

profile_positions.description: On behalf of our Department of Information and Computing Sciences (Utrecht University), I was member of the installment panel of the Faculties of Science and Geosciences' ethical review committee. We analyzed the needs and requirements and, subsequently, defined the official regulation, the electronic application form, the underlying processes and planning.
profile_positions.title: Member of the installment panel of the ethical review committee

profile_positions.description:
Open Computer Science is an open access, peer-reviewed journal. The journal publishes research results in the following fields:
- algorithms and complexity theory
- artificial intelligence
- bioinformatics
- networking and security systems
- programming languages
- system and software engineering
- theoretical foundations of computer science
The mission of Open Computer Science is to become a premier publishing venue for researchers to communicate and promote their achievements to the worldwide scientific community. The journal is designed to facilitate the exchange of ideas between researchers from different countries.
profile_positions.title: Editor-in-Chief @ Open Computer Science

profile_positions.description:
Open Computer Science (previously: Central European Journal of Computer Science) is an open access, peer-reviewed journal. The journal publishes research results in the following fields:
- algorithms and complexity theory
- artificial intelligence
- bioinformatics
- networking and security systems
- programming languages
- system and software engineering
- theoretical foundations of computer science
The mission of Open Computer Science is to become a premier publishing venue for researchers to communicate and promote their achievements to the worldwide scientific community. The journal is designed to facilitate the exchange of ideas between researchers from different countries.
profile_positions.title: Editorial board member @ Open Computer Science

profile_positions.description: Management of the review process of submitted manuscripts. Additionally, I was assigned to handle reviews of books and other media.
profile_positions.title: Editorial board member @ Journal of Ambient Intelligence and Smart Environments (JAISE)

profile_positions.description: Associate Editor of Signals, a newly established, international, peer-reviewed, open access journal on the science and engineering of signals and its applications.
profile_positions.title: Associate Editor @ Signals

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the review process of submitted articles, including the appointment of editorial board members and the selection of experts. Decide on whether or not an article can be accepted for publication.
